name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Thurmond R. BERRY, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Thurmond R. BERRY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gerald A. Stein, Philadelphia, Court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1212
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Thurmond R. BERRY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Gerald A. Stein, Philadelphia, Court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
